display_name: Kids Wahp North Atlantic Right Whale Track Pants—Cobalt Blue
size: ['Cobalt Blue 3 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 6 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 9 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 12 YR']
description: PANGAIA x We Are Hairy People (WAHP) is an initiative to raise awareness around endangered animals and highlight the importance of mindful consumption. This upcycling capsule features unique, hand-painted designs that give old styles a new life. These Track Pants are created using a soft loopback fabric similar to French Terry, made from organic cotton and features a hand-painted North Atlantic Right Whale. By protecting the places where they live, we can help them thrive and contribute to their ecosystem, maintaining a balanced and healthy planet. Did you know? The North Atlantic Right Whale is the most endangered whale species, with only about 400 of them left in chilly Atlantic coastal waters. They play a role in reversing climate change. Over their lifetime, their bodies accumulate and store around 1,500 times more carbon than a tree. ### Kenedy is 121cm / 3'11, she is wearing a size 6YR.

description: PANGAIA x We Are Hairy People (WAHP) is an initiative to raise awareness around endangered animals and highlight the importance of mindful consumption. This upcycling capsule features unique, hand-painted designs that give old styles a new life. This T-Shirt is made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. PPRMINT™ has natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to keep your T-shirt fresh for longer, meaning it can be washed less often—saving water, energy and time and features hand-painted Macaroni Penguin. By protecting the places where they live, we can help them thrive and contribute to their ecosystem, maintaining a balanced and healthy planet. Did you know? Macaroni penguins eat 4 million tonnes of krill a year but rising sea temperatures and unsustainable fishing practices have reduced the amount of krill that they have access to—making their population the most vulnerable it’s been in decades. ### Kenedy is 121cm / 3'11, she is wearing a size 6YR.

Our new reusable water bottle, created in partnership with Ocean Bottle, is designed to keep plastic out of the ocean. This small bottle has a big impact. For each one sold, Ocean Bottle funds the collection of equivalent to 1,000 plastic bottles. Ocean Bottle partners with Plastic Bank to support plastic collectors in coastal communities to collect, sort and recycle plastic pollution where it is at its worst and keep it out of the ocean. Created to be the last reusable bottle you’ll ever need, this water bottle is built to last, dishwasher safe, easy clean, has a double opening and keeps your drinks hot or cold. ### With Box: 24.3cm x 8cm x 8cm. Weight: 360g. Without box: 24cm x 7.8cm. Weight:320g. Volume: 500ml.

Ocean Bottle partners with Plastic Bank to support plastic collectors in coastal communities to collect, sort and recycle plastic pollution where it is at its worst and keep it out of the ocean. Created to be the last reusable bottle you’ll ever need, this water bottle is built to last, dishwasher safe, easy clean, has a double opening and keeps your drinks hot or cold. ### With Box: 24.3cm x 8cm x 8cm. Weight: 360g. Without box: 24cm x 7.8cm. Weight:320g. Volume: 500ml.

display_name: Men'S Recycled Cashmere Track Pants—Cobalt Blue
size: ['Cobalt Blue XS', 'Cobalt Blue S', 'Cobalt Blue M', 'Cobalt Blue L', 'Cobalt Blue XL', 'Cobalt Blue XXL']
description: Introducing our Recycled Cashmere Track Pants made from a post-consumer Recycled Cashmere Blend (GRS certified) sourced from garments collected in the US and EU. Responsibly soft, cozy and warm. These Cobalt Blue Track Pants have a ribbed, elasticated waistband with a drawstring and two side pockets. The fit is relaxed with ribbed cuffs at the hem. We choose post-consumer materials like discarded garments (existing fabrics), rather than pre-consumer materials like production offcuts (unused fabrics), meaning we’re able to give the fibers a second life. This helps reduce reliance on virgin resources, diverts waste from landfill and supports the transition to a circular economy. Please note: Due to import restrictions we are unable to ship our recycled cashmere products to Saudi Arabia at this time. ### Mahlon is 178cm / 5’10 , he is wearing a size M.

display_name: Kids Protect The Species Koala Hoodie—Grey Marl
description: We partnered with artist Raku Inoue to raise awareness around endangered animals through a series of artworks created using real plants and flowers. Koalas consume excess vegetation, reducing the biomass that fuels frequent and intense fires. They have been disproportionately affected during the recent Australian bushfires partly because they are slower-moving creatures, so cannot escape quickly, while around 30% of koala habitat in New South Wales has been destroyed. Part of the proceeds from our Kids Protect The Species capsule will be donated to biodiversity and wildlife conservation organizations. ### Jasiri is 118cm / 3'10, he is wearing a size 5-6YR

display_name: Kids Protect The Species Borneo Pygmy Elephant Hoodie—Sand
description: We partnered with artist Raku Inoue to raise awareness around endangered animals through a series of artworks created using real plants and flowers. Borneo Pygmy Elephants are a high conservation priority as they are endangered, yet they remain the least-understood elephants in the world. Part of the proceeds from our Kids Protect The Species capsule will be donated to biodiversity and wildlife conservation organizations. ### Jasiri is 118cm / 3'10, he is wearing a size 5-6YR

Koalas consume excess vegetation, reducing the biomass that fuels frequent and intense fires. They have been disproportionately affected during the recent Australian bushfires partly because they are slower-moving creatures, so cannot escape quickly, while around 30% of koala habitat in New South Wales has been destroyed. Part of the proceeds from our Kids Protect The Species capsule will be donated to biodiversity and wildlife conservation organizations. ### Chloe is 111cm / 3’7, she is wearing a size 5-6YR

display_name: Kids Protect The Species Bumblebee Hoodie—Saffron Yellow
description: We partnered with artist Raku Inoue to raise awareness around endangered animals through a series of artworks created using real plants and flowers. Bumblebees are balancing on the brink of extinction, with population down nearly 90% since 1990 due to the negative effects of climate change, loss of habitat, pesticides, diseases and parasites. description: These Recycled Cotton Cuffed Track Pants are designed for women, with a seamless side, relaxed fit and finished with elasticated ribbed cuffs. description: Inspired by 90s activewear, PANGAIA Move is designed to bring you on-the-go style, without compromising on comfort. The Zipped Jacket is a relaxed fit, made from 100%  Organic Cotton. It has detailed paneling, loose sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a stand-up collar, recycled polyester zips and two side pockets with concealed zips. The fabric is treated with natural PPRMINT™ Oil to keep it fresher for longer. The Off-White color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. ### Ibraheem is 189cm / 6’2 , he is wearing a size M.

description: Inspired by 90s activewear, PANGAIA Move is designed to bring you on-the-go style, without compromising on comfort. The Zipped Jacket is a relaxed fit, made from 100%  Organic Cotton. The outer material has a smooth finish with a subtle sheen and a soft cotton texture inside. It has detailed paneling, loose sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a stand-up collar, recycled polyester zips and two side pockets with concealed zips. The fabric is treated with natural PPRMINT™ Oil to keep it fresher for longer. The Orchid Purple color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Our styles are still available in the sizes you know and love, we’ve simply adjusted them to US 0-US 10 so it’s a bit easier to choose which size is right for you. Please note, your product may still have our previous size convention on the label (eg. if you have ordered a US 8, you may receive your garment with a size L label but don’t worry, the measurements haven’t changed). ### Karishma is 172cm / 5’8, she is wearing a size US4.

Introducing our Recycled Cashmere Beanie made from a post-consumer Recycled Cashmere Blend (GRS certified) sourced from garments collected in the US and EU. Responsibly soft, cozy and warm. This Cornflower Blue beanie is a chunky knit with no fold, designed to sit close to the head with the seam at the back. We choose post-consumer materials like discarded garments (existing fabrics), rather than pre-consumer materials like production offcuts (unused fabrics), meaning we’re able to give the fibers a second life. This helps reduce reliance on virgin resources, diverts waste from landfill and supports the transition to a circular economy. Please note: Due to import restrictions we are unable to ship our recycled cashmere products to Saudi Arabia at this time. Raihanna and Maholon are wearing our Recycled Cashmere Beanie, which comes in One Size. ###

size: ['Rosemary Green XS', 'Rosemary Green S', 'Rosemary Green M', 'Rosemary Green L', 'Rosemary Green XL', 'Rosemary Green XXL']
description: PANGAIA 365, our oh-so-soft essentials designed to be worn across the 4 seasons, 365 days a year. The Bomber Jacket is made from soft organic cotton, suitable to wear all-year long. The design is longer than the women’s version and is left unlined to create a classic bomber silhouette. It has rib detailing at the sleeve and hem, two side pockets and a tonal zip closure. This style is designed to be a comfy layering piece. It’s a medium weight fabric, with a loop back texture inside and a finishing for extra softness. The Rosemary Green color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. ### Kofi is 190cm / 6’3, he is wearing a size M.

Perfect for layering. It’s a medium weight fabric, with a loop back texture inside and a finishing for extra softness. The Orchid Purple color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Our styles are still available in the sizes you know and love, we’ve simply adjusted them to US 0-US 10 so it’s a bit easier to choose which size is right for you. Please note, your product may still have our previous size convention on the label (eg. if you have ordered a US 8, you may receive your garment with a size L label but don’t worry, the measurements haven’t changed). ### Connie is 176cm / 5’9, she is wearing a size US4.

PANGAIA 365, our oh-so-soft essentials designed to be worn across the 4 seasons, 365 days a year. The One Size Sweatshirt is made from a medium weight organic cotton fabric with a loop back texture inside and a finishing for extra softness. The design mirrors our Organic Cotton Sweatshirt but is longer in length and available in one, oversized size. It has a classic round neckline, oversized sleeves, rib detailing at the hem and sleeve cuffs for a clean finish—designed to be an oversized, everyday staple. The Jade Green color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. ### Connie is 176cm / 5’9. This Sweatshirt is one size fits all.

Introducing our Recycled Cashmere Scarf made from a post-consumer Recycled Cashmere Blend (GRS certified) sourced from garments collected in the US and EU. Responsibly soft, cozy and warm. This Aubergine Purple scarf is extra long and comes in a chunky knit. The finish is sleek with a neat edge and has been washed to make it extra soft. We choose post-consumer materials like discarded garments (existing fabrics), rather than pre-consumer materials like production offcuts (unused fabrics), meaning we’re able to give the fibers a second life. This helps reduce reliance on virgin resources, diverts waste from landfill and supports the transition to a circular economy. Please note: Due to import restrictions we are unable to ship our recycled cashmere products to Saudi Arabia at this time. display_name: Iwd Upcycled Capsule The Journey Forward T-Shirt—Orchid Purple
size: ['Orchid Purple XXS', 'Orchid Purple XS', 'Orchid Purple S', 'Orchid Purple M', 'Orchid Purple L']
description: Introducing our limited edition upcycled capsule created in honor of International Women's Day. It features three bespoke artworks by Amber Vittoria, printed on T-shirts from previous collections. The Orchid Purple T-shirt is made with Organic Cotton, colored using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Designed to celebrate women far beyond Women’s History Month, 50% of the proceeds will be donated to Choose Love, an organization supporting refugees and displaced people. These funds will be directed specifically towards women’s centres offering everything from language lessons and vocational training, to healthcare and legal support—helping women turn adversity into hope. ###

description: This Cropped Shoulder T-shirt is made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. The Jade Green color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Jade Green was inspired by the beak of the Keel-billed toucan, a very social tropical forest bird. The Keel-billed toucan also sports 5 of the 7 brand colors of PANGAIA.  ###

description: This Long Sleeve T-shirt is made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. PPRMINT™ has natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to keep your T-shirt fresh for longer, meaning it can be washed less often—saving water, energy and time. The Saffron Yellow color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. description: Meet C-FIBER™: Our latest innovation that turns nature into fabric using eucalyptus pulp and seaweed powder. The resulting material is water-saving, carbon neutral and biodegradable. This Women’s Long Sleeve Top is a similar fit to our High Neck Long Sleeve T-shirt but with a lower ribbed neckline. The fabric is fluid, soft to the touch and a lighter weight than the men’s version. The fit is tighter than the men’s, with a higher shoulder seam. The Off-White color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system.  Our styles are still available in the sizes you know and love, we’ve simply adjusted them to US 0-US 10 so it’s a bit easier to choose which size is right for you. Please note, your product may still have our previous size convention on the label (eg. if you have ordered a US 8, you may receive your garment with a size L label but don’t worry, the measurements haven’t changed). ### Amandine is 175cm / 5’9 , she is wearing a size US 4.

display_name: C-Fiber™ Pure High Neck Dress—Orchid Purple
size: ['Orchid Purple US0', 'Orchid Purple US2', 'Orchid Purple US4', 'Orchid Purple US6', 'Orchid Purple US8', 'Orchid Purple US10', 'Orchid Purple US12']
description: Meet C-FIBER™: Our latest innovation that turns nature into fabric using eucalyptus pulp and seaweed powder. The resulting material is water-saving, carbon neutral and biodegradable. description: Inspired by loungewear, our Pajamas are designed to be as versatile as your lifestyle.Hangout in them, WFH in them and even head outside in them. A perfect wardrobe staple. The Loungewear Tops is made using a combination of eucalyptus, seaweed and organic cotton, treated with natural PPRMINT™ Oil to keep it fresher for longer. The fabric is the same as our Seaweed Fiber T-shirts with the same fit as our Recycled Cotton Hoodie. This style is designed to be comfy and loose with no elastic. The Stone color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system.Please keep away from fire. ### Lexy is 198cm / 6’, he is wearing size M.

All PANGAIA Kids T-shirts are made from 100% organic cotton which is chemical-free, and therefore a completely non-irritant fabric. Grown without the use of harmful pesticides and fertilizers, it is suitable for all types of skin, especially those with sensitive skin. We have taken precautions to ensure it is completely safe, free from toxic colours, fragrances, bleaches and other harmful products. So, you can rest assured that what you’re putting on your child is 100% natural. It also feels much softer than regular cotton, so it’s great for children’s sensitive skin. ###

size: ['Cobalt Blue 3 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 6 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 9 YR', 'Cobalt Blue 12 YR']
description: Mother Earth and its beautiful blue color (as seen from space) is the inspiration behind the Cobalt blue hue. Cobalt blue was first recorded as a color name in English back in 1777. Now, in 2019, it is one of the seven colors of PANGAIA (Pan meaning ‘all-inclusive’, especially in relation to the whole of a continent, racial group or religion and Gaia meaning ‘Mother Earth’).  ### Zayne is 115cm / 3'9, she is wearing age 5YR-6YR. Hannah is 105cm / 3'4, she is wearing age 3YR-4YR.

size: ['Persimmon Orange 3 YR', 'Persimmon Orange 6 YR', 'Persimmon Orange 9 YR', 'Persimmon Orange 12 YR']
description: The PANGAIA brand color orange was inspired by clownfish that form a symbiotic relationship with anemones. The toxic anemone provides protection from predators and leftovers for the clownfish. In return, the clownfish drives off intruders and preens the anemone (by removing parasites). All clownfish are born male with the ability to switch their sex (which is irreversible). Sometimes the change is made when mating. Two males will become mates and the larger, dominant fish will become the female. If the female dies, the dominant male will become a female to replace her. ### Sabrina is 152cm / 4'11, she is wearing age 11YR-12YR.

description: Introducing a limited-edition capsule collection designed to support and celebrate the 5th anniversary of the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), in partnership with the UN. They have the power to create a better world by 2030, where no one is left behind. This breathable Grey Marl Hoodie was made using a mix of recycled and organic cotton. display_name: Pprmint™ Organic Cotton Slim Fit T-Shirt—Celestial Blue
size: ['Celestial Blue US2', 'Celestial Blue US4', 'Celestial Blue US6', 'Celestial Blue US8', 'Celestial Blue US10']
description: The Slim Fit T-shirt is a fitted style with a small capped sleeve and a boxy cut, designed to be close fitting to the body. If you prefer a more relaxed fit, please size up. It's made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. PPRMINT™ has natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to keep your T-shirt fresh for longer, meaning it can be washed less often—saving water, energy and time. The Celestial Blue color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Our styles are still available in the sizes you know and love, we’ve simply adjusted them to US 0-US 10 so it’s a bit easier to choose which size is right for you. Please note, your product may still have our previous size convention on the label (eg. if you have ordered a US 8, you may receive your garment with a size L label but don’t worry, the measurements haven’t changed). ### Jiahe is 171cm / 5’7, she is wearing a size US 4.

description: This Cropped Shoulder T-shirt is made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. PPRMINT™ has natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to keep your T-shirt fresh for longer, meaning it can be washed less often—saving water, energy and time. The Flamingo Pink color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Salt lakes were the main inspiration behind the Flamingo Pink color, often the home and breeding sites of flamingos. Did you know? Flamingos are not actually pink. Instead, they are born with grey feathers that gradually turn pink due to their diet of brine shrimp and blue-green algae.  ### Shem is 189cm / 6’2 , he is wearing size M.

description: This Cropped Shoulder T-shirt is made using Organic Cotton and treated with our trademark technology: PPRMINT™ oil. PPRMINT™ has natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties to keep your T-shirt fresh for longer, meaning it can be washed less often—saving water, energy and time. The Celestial Blue color was created using Environmentally Friendly Dyes and a recycled water system. Celestial Blue was inspired by the metallic colored wings and body of a dragonfly. Meet FLWRDWN™: A bio-based down-fill material created using natural wild flowers and a biopolymer. Both materials are biodegradable and infused with aerogel for performance and durability. This Black Puffer Beanie can be worn down or folded up. It has our classic text block on the rim which is visible when folded up, and an embroidered FLWRDWN™ logo on the inside which is visible when folded down. This plant-powered, breathable alternative to traditional animal-derived down is designed to keep you warm and cozy, even in the coldest climates.  ###
